name: headless
description:
I lost my head but I found someone else's! 
Navigate your teammate until you meet him and give his head back.

This is a cooperative online game. 
You can see your partner (because he is holding your head) but not yourself.
You must give your partner instructions on how to move in order to reach your body without falling in any holes.
Likewise, your partner must give you instructions to reach him. 
Both are happening simultaneously - try not to get confused.

There is voice chat in the game.
